name: Unbreakable Dinny Schmeze
description:
Can Dinny keep the underground doomsday bunker from breaking down till rescue arrives? Help Dinny turn the mystery crank to ward off the explosive fire monster. 

Press the UP arrow to crank, and keep the power level in the green zone.

Game submission for the TV Game Jam 2019 #TVGameJam

Inspired by the TV series Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt

Hope you enjoy the game! Be unbreakable :)
